title: Every time a game end my PC freeze
body:
Hi, can't understand why after any kind of match I do, after the game end, press the button after win\lose and my pc stays black.Need to shut down manually.
I know is not the best machine, is an Asus Vivobook S400CA, Intel i5 3xxx with Intel HD 4000, 6Gb of ram and SSD.
Got the latest Windows 10 update as well. Should I try old video drivers?
Thanks for your time

replies.body:
Tech isn't my strong suit so I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll likely be able to help you more than anyone here can. They do have a high volume of requests at the moment so a response might be delayed a bit, but you should get something within 48~ hours.
